name: Portfolio
desc: My first personal project. This was my first step into becoming a web developer. Enjoyed creating this to learn ReactJS from the ground up.

name: CSS Visualizer
desc: A helpful tool to help easily visualize CSS values as I learn to internalize common CSS practices. Without needing to create a new web app, I can see how I should plan out the main CSS.
